data.name: The Asfrixa
data.detailed_description:
You, are trapped in an unknown facility, which, between the lines, was created specifically for you.

And like every ordinary person, you want to get out.
To get out, your only alternative is to pass the challenges using your powers, and leave something, very, precious, behind.

Your sanity.

Solve your problems at once, face them, and get out of it.
He does not exist.

The Asfrixa
Play as "She", and solve the challenges ahead using game mechanics and interactions with the scenario!

Face a nightmare at every end of testing with a completely revamped Gameplay, increase your jumping potential, and manage to complete challenges faster than they really are.

Achievements
The game includes in-game achievements to unlock by performing various activities!
Discover the protagonist's past by interacting with objects on the map and create your own perception of sight.

data.short_description: Trapped in an installation made for "Asfrixa's", you'll have to go through your worst nightmares and puzzles to find your way out before being consumed by the shadows along with the place.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400f
  • Graphics: RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Support for Ray Tracing in Ultra Settigs.
